metadata.name: remove_sprite_swf_4
metadata.description: Comprehensive tests for REMOVE_SPRITE opcode (0x25) - removes a clone sprite/MovieClip from the display list. Tests basic removal, non-existent sprites, empty strings, special characters, and path notation. Complete in NO_GRAPHICS mode (no-op behavior is correct).
missing_features: Graphics mode: Display list management system not implemented
Graphics mode: MovieClip reference counting not implemented
Graphics mode: Actual sprite removal and resource cleanup requires SDL3/Vulkan rendering
